tool.name: Scater calculate qc metrics
tool.description: The QC metrics are calculated from serialized scater R object
tool.command:
ln -s '$R_scater_serialized' R_scater_serialized.rds;
scater-calculate-qc-metrics.R -i '$R_scater_serialized' #if $exprs_values: -e '$exprs_values' #end if #if $feature_controls: -f '$feature_controls' #end if #if $cell_controls: -c '$cell_controls' #end if #if $nmads: -n '$nmads' #end if #if $pct_feature_controls_threshold: -p 'pct_feature_controls_threshold' #end if -o '$R_scater_qc'

param.name: R_scater_serialized
param.help: singleCellExperiment object containing expression values and experimental information. Must have been appropriately prepared.

param.name: exprs_values
param.label: expression counts values from RDS object
param.help: character, indicating slot of the assays of the object that should be used to define expression. Valid options are counts as default. tpm, fpkm and logcounts, or anything else in the object added manually by the user.

param.name: feature_controls
param.label: feature controls
param.help: file containing a list of the control files with one file per line. Each control file should have one feature (e.g. gene) per line. A named list is created (names derived from control file names) containing one or more vectors to identify feature controls (for example, ERCC spike-in genes, mitochondrial genes, etc)

param.name: cell_controls
param.label: cell controls
param.help: file (one cell per line) to be used to derive a vector of cell (sample) names used to identify cell controls (for example, blank wells or bulk controls).

param.name: nmads
param.label: number of median absolute deviations
param.help: numeric scalar giving the number of median absolute deviations to be used to flag potentially problematic cells based on total counts (total number of counts for the cell, or library size) and total_features (number of features with non-zero expression). For total_features, cells are flagged for filtering only if total_features is nmads below the median.

param.name: pct_feature_controls_threshold
param.label: threshold for percentage of expression values
param.help: numeric scalar giving a threshold for percentage of expression values accounted for by feature controls. Used as to flag cells that may be filtered based on high percentage of expression from feature controls.

tool.help:
Usage: scater-calculate-qc-metrics.R [options]
Options: -i INPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --input-object-file=INPUT-OBJECT-FILE
-e EXPRS-VALUES, --exprs-values=EXPRS-VALUES
-f FEATURE-CONTROLS, --feature-controls=FEATURE-CONTROLS
-c CELL-CONTROLS, --cell-controls=CELL-CONTROLS
-n NMADS, --nmads=NMADS
-p PCT-FEATURE-CONTROLS-THRESHOLD, --pct-feature-controls-threshold=PCT-FEATURE-CONTROLS-THRESHOLD
-o OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --output-object-file=OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE file name in which to store serialized R object of type SingleCellExperiment
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
